title: The Key Diplomatic Role Türkiye Played in the Israel-Iran Conflict
description: On Tuesday, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan met with US President Donald Trump on the margins of the NATO summit at the Hague. His office issued a statement afterwards: 'Welcoming the ceasefire reached between Israel and Iran through the efforts of U.S…
